[Groovy] Class UriMappingsAwareUIProvider

java.lang.Object
  com.vaadin.server.UIProvider
      src.groovy.com.vaadin.grails.server.UriMappingsAwareUIProvider

class UriMappingsAwareUIProvider
extends UIProvider

An com.vaadin.server.UIProvider implementation that uses mappings provided by a UriMappingsHolder.

Authors:
Stephan Grundner
